issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.squareup.picasso.RemoteViewsAction.NotificationAction)
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
A newer version of com.google.firebase:firebase-bom than 32.2.0 is available: 32.2.3
A newer version of com.google.firebase:firebase-crashlytics than 18.4.0 is available: 18.4.1
Should use "`sp`" instead of "`dp`" for text sizes
Should use "`sp`" instead of "`dp`" for text sizes

Use a `layout_width` of `0dp` instead of `144dp` for better performance

When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry
